      • maxEntrySize

        @NotNull
public ReplicationHub.Builder maxEntrySize(int maxEntrySize)
        Configures the maximum entry size of ChronicleHashes, replicated via ReplicationHubs, created by this builder.

        Default value is 1024.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        this builder object back, for chaining
        See Also:

      • maxNumberOfChannels

        @NotNull
public ReplicationHub.Builder maxNumberOfChannels(int maxNumberOfChannels)
        Configures the maximum number of channels could be ReplicationHub.createChannel(int) created for ReplicationHubs, created by this builder.

        Default value is 128.

        Parameters:
        maxNumberOfChannels - ReplicationHub.maxNumberOfChannels() of ReplicationHubs, created by this builder
        Returns:
        this builder object back, for chaining
        See Also:
        ReplicationHub.maxNumberOfChannels()
